Requirements.name: Requirements Time
Requirements.description: As soon as requirements are defined, the uncertainty is resolved.

Design.name: Design Time
Design.description: As soon as the system is designed, the uncertainty is resolved

Realization.name: Realization Time
Realization.description: As soon as the system or parts of it are implemented and deployed, the uncertainty is resolved.
Realization.exampleText: Where a software system is deployed and used.

Runtime.name: Runtime
Runtime.description: As knowledge is gained from testing and system operations, the uncertainty is resolved.
